long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spiral Roll is an addictive and satisfying game available as a Chrome extension. Embark on a unique journey where you control a spiral-shaped blade, tasked with slicing through various objects to create a perfect spiral. Swipe and rotate your blade to cut through wooden blocks, fruits, and other obstacles, carefully shaping them into beautiful spirals. The game challenges your precision and timing as you strive to create the longest and most intricate spirals. With each successful cut, you earn points and unlock new blades with different designs. 
The smooth controls, vibrant visuals, and satisfying slicing effects make Spiral Roll a satisfying and enjoyable gaming experience. Whether you're looking for a relaxing way to unwind or a challenging game to test your skills, Spiral Roll on Chrome Extension is sure to keep you engaged. Get ready to spin, slice, and create mesmerizing spirals in this addictive and visually appealing game.
